flawed_nl_solution:
He has already done 246 this week because 34 + 20 + 123 + 64 + 23 = <<34+20+123+64+23=246>>246.
If he does 78 he will have done as many as last week because 324 - 246 = <<324-246=78>>78
He has to do 79 on Saturday because 78 + 1 = <<78+1=79>>79
#### 79

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 264, not 246. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
